name: Invalid Festivities
obverse: Three coat of arms around a circle. The top coat of arms is for Hamburg.
reverse: An inscription in 4 lines surrounded by a wreath.
reverse_inscriptions: DE OFFRED' ALT, HVAD OFFRES KAN FOR ÆRE, DROT OG FÆDRELAND. V.B.
description: Not much information is available for this medal. It has a beautiful proof-like finish.
